title: Record-breaking open interest on CME shows growing market activity
description:

title: China Mulls Digital Yuan Settlements for Commodities
description: The People’s Bank of China (PBOC) is considering using the digital yuan to settle services and commodities trades with Hong Kong. According to Di Gang, deputy director-general of the Digital Currency Institute of the PBOC, this would help companies avoid the difficulties of using a single high-cost, cross-border payment channel. title: CryptoPunks drive NFT surge with $1.1m sale
description: A CryptoPunks NFT recently sold for 600 Ethereum (ETH), worth $1.14 million, representing the largest single NFT sale over the past seven days and the second-largest last month. The sale, involving CryptoPunk #7458, occurred on Nov. 6 at Larva Labs.…

title: Kraken Plans to Launch Layer-2 Blockchain to Rival Coinbase’s Base
description:
